_comment: Change to new database, don't have ID column anymore, unique_iotime become local_iotime, etc...
name: job-percent

title.text: Total Bytes Distribution for Each App

query.merged_query: (select h1.appname,h1.less_than_one_giga,h1.one_giga_to_ten_giga, h1.ten_to_hundred_giga,h1.hundred_to_tera,h1.more_than_tera, h1.sum_bytes,h1.max,h2.median    from (select g1.appname,g1.less_than_one_giga,g1.one_giga_to_ten_giga, g1.ten_to_hundred_giga,g1.hundred_to_tera,g1.more_than_tera, g1.sum_bytes,g2.max from (select f1.appname,f1.less_than_one_giga,f1.one_giga_to_ten_giga, f1.ten_to_hundred_giga,f1.hundred_to_tera,f1.more_than_tera, f2.sum_bytes from (select e1.appname,e1.less_than_one_giga,e1.one_giga_to_ten_giga, e1.ten_to_hundred_giga,e1.hundred_to_tera,e2.more_than_tera   from (select d1.appname,d1.less_than_one_giga,d1.one_giga_to_ten_giga, d1.ten_to_hundred_giga,d2.hundred_to_tera from    (select c1.appname,c1.less_than_one_giga,c1.one_giga_to_ten_giga, c2.ten_to_hundred_giga    from   (select b1.appname,b1.less_than_one_giga, b2.one_giga_to_ten_giga from  (select a1.appname, a2.less_than_one_giga from (select appname from jobs_info group by appname) a1 left join (select appname, count(total_bytes) as less_than_one_giga from jobs_info where total_bytes<1073741824 group by appname) a2 on a1.appname=a2.appname) b1  inner join     (select a1.appname, a2.one_giga_to_ten_giga from (select appname from jobs_info group by appname) a1 left join (select appname, count(total_bytes) as one_giga_to_ten_giga  from jobs_info where total_bytes >1073741824 and total_bytes < 10737418240 group by appname) a2 on a1.appname=a2.appname) b2  on b1.appname=b2.appname ) c1     inner join     (select a1.appname, a2.ten_to_hundred_giga from (select appname from jobs_info group by appname) a1 left join (select appname, count(total_bytes) as ten_to_hundred_giga from jobs_info where total_bytes>10737418240 and total_bytes < 107374182400 group by appname) a2 on a1.appname=a2.appname) c2  on  c1.appname=c2.appname        ) d1      inner join (select a1.appname, a2.hundred_to_tera from (select appname from jobs_info group by appname) a1 left join (select appname, count(total_bytes) as hundred_to_tera from jobs_info where total_bytes>107374182400 and total_bytes < 1099511627776 group by appname) a2 on a1.appname=a2.appname) d2  on d1.appname=d2.appname ) e1    inner join (select a1.appname, a2.more_than_tera from (select appname from jobs_info group by appname) a1 left join (select appname, count(total_bytes) as more_than_tera from jobs_info where total_bytes > 1099511627776 group by appname) a2 on a1.appname=a2.appname) e2  on  e1.appname=e2.appname ) f1     inner join (select appname,sum(total_bytes) as sum_bytes from jobs_info where total_bytes is not null group by appname) f2     on  f1.appname=f2.appname) g1     inner join (select a1.appname, a2.max from (select appname from jobs_info group by appname) a1 left join (select appname, max(total_bytes) as max from jobs_info where total_bytes is not null group by appname) a2 on a1.appname=a2.appname) g2 on  g1.appname=g2.appname) h1   inner join (select a1.appname, a2.median from (select appname from jobs_info group by appname) a1 left join (select appname, median(total_bytes) as median from jobs_info where total_bytes is not null group by appname) a2 on a1.appname=a2.appname) h2 on  h1.appname=h2.appname)
query.less_than_one_giga: select a1.appname, a2.less_than_one_giga from (select appname from jobs_info group by appname) a1 left join (select appname, count(total_bytes) as less_than_one_giga from jobs_info where total_bytes<1073741824 group by appname) a2 on a1.appname=a2.appname
query.one_giga_to_ten_giga: select a1.appname, a2.one_giga_to_ten_giga from (select appname from jobs_info group by appname) a1 left join (select appname, count(total_bytes) as one_giga_to_ten_giga  from jobs_info where total_bytes >1073741824 and total_bytes < 10737418240 group by appname) a2 on a1.appname=a2.appname
query.ten_to_hundred_giga: select a1.appname, a2.ten_to_hundred_giga from (select appname from jobs_info group by appname) a1 left join (select appname, count(total_bytes) as ten_to_hundred_giga from jobs_info where total_bytes>10737418240 and total_bytes < 107374182400 group by appname) a2 on a1.appname=a2.appname
query.hundred_to_tera: select a1.appname, a2.hundred_to_tera from (select appname from jobs_info group by appname) a1 left join (select appname, count(total_bytes) as hundred_to_tera from jobs_info where total_bytes>107374182400 and total_bytes < 1099511627776 group by appname) a2 on a1.appname=a2.appname
query.more_than_tera: select a1.appname, a2.more_than_tera from (select appname from jobs_info group by appname) a1 left join (select appname, count(total_bytes) as more_than_tera from jobs_info where total_bytes > 1099511627776 group by appname) a2 on a1.appname=a2.appname
query.median_bytes: select a1.appname, a2.median from (select appname from jobs_info group by appname) a1 left join (select appname, median(total_bytes) as median from jobs_info where total_bytes is not null group by appname) a2 on a1.appname=a2.appname
query.max_bytes: select a1.appname, a2.max from (select appname from jobs_info group by appname) a1 left join (select appname, max(total_bytes) as max from jobs_info where total_bytes is not null group by appname) a2 on a1.appname=a2.appname
